p: This study was conducted from June, 2014 to October, 2015 in the Kyela and Morogoro districts, Tanzania. During the 2006/2007 RVF outbreak in Tanzania, ten regions were affected [ 20]. The Morogoro region was one of the ten regions, but only two districts, the Kilombero and Ulanga districts were affected, while the Morogoro district was not affected [ 7]. The Mbeya region, where the Kyela district is located, was not affected during the 2006/2007 RVF outbreak in Tanzania [ 7, 20].
